subtitles.subtitle: MID-IR SPECTROSCOPY
subtitles.subText: Dipole moments in molecular bonds can vibrate with energies that correspond to the mid-infrared region of light such that light passing through can be absorbed by the bonds that match in energy. As the dipole moments are affected by the bond and the surroundings, Mid-IR spectroscopy can be used to identify molecules and combined with measurement of the intensity to also quantify the concentration.

subtitles.subtitle: KINETICS, MOLECULAR STRUCTURE AND THERMODYNAMIC STUDIES
subtitles.subText: Researchers may use our spectrometer to expound the different molecular structures of the reaction species with potential kinetic and thermodynamic pathways, enabling green synthesis, new catalysts, molecules and reactions.

subtitles.subtitle: INLINE PROCESS MONITORING
subtitles.subText: Process industries such as (pharmaceutical, specialty chemicals, petrochemicals, chemicals, food and beverage) industries using liquid chemicals in their processes, can use our spectrometer to monitor reactions, reduce cycle times, maximize yield, reduce wastes, improve sustainability, control quality and scale up reactions.

subtitles.subtitle: ROBUST AND COMPACT
subtitles.subText: At a size of 5 * 5.5 * 6 cm, the Novel Mid-IR Spectrometer is a fraction of the size of all traditional spectrometers. It does not use any moving components or fragile optical fibers, allowing you the freedom to decide where and how you want to use the spectrometer.

subtitles.subtitle: 1. Real-Time Insights
subtitles.subText: Integrated IR sensors deliver continuous, live data-enabling instant adjustments to reaction conditions for better control and faster optimization.

subtitles.subtitle: 2. Non-Destructive Analysis
subtitles.subText: IR spectroscopy is completely non-invasive, allowing for sample integrity to be maintained for further testing or downstream analysis.

subtitles.subtitle: 3. High Sensitivity
subtitles.subText: Detects even low concentrations of reactants and products, ensuring accurate, reliable tracking of reaction progress.

subtitles.subtitle: 1. Accurate Residence Time Prediction
subtitles.subText: The measured peak residence times closely aligned with theoretical expectations, validating the reliability of the system's flow characterization capabilities.

subtitles.subtitle: 2. Highly Reproducible RTD Profiles
subtitles.subText: RTD curves consistently captured both primary flow behavior and subtle secondary features.

subtitles.subtitle: 3. Compact & Accessible Setup
subtitles.subText: All measurements were performed using a single, USB-pwered device, demonstrating the simplicity, portability, and accessibility of the RTD system-no complex instrumentation or setup required.
